post.text: Today - I outlined a plan for American economic revival - it is bold, ambitious, forward-looking plan to massively INCREASE JOBS, WAGES, INCOMES and opportunities for the people of our country!

comment.author: Andrew
comment.text: trump weight 300lb. his head alone got to go 130lbs.heart attack on its way.good thing Hillary will crush him in nov..

replies.author: Bethany
replies.text: Lol. You are desperate. Hillary's numbers are dropping like crazy! Mr Trump is maybe 20 lbs overweight. Hillary is in such bad shape , physically and mentally that she is bedridden !!

replies.text: Heart Attack and Hillary are more likely to happen. Fainting , seizures , overweight ? Geeze. My vote is for Hillary !!
